markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />Interact ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per round;   **Effect** You play the drum, unleashing a rhythm that gets other moving. Up to 2 allies that can hear the drum can use a reaction to Stride 5 feet.
name: Interact (auditory, emotion, enchantment, mental)
